column1: ap 00:58|"two to one"|"The tick turned around and pushed from the other direction. Now it was two to one
column2: and the key resumed motion toward the lock. It was getting close. ""Go
column5: urging her team on."|"Demons Don't Dream"|"Piers Anthony"

column1: ap 01:58|"two to two"|"But another tick crowded into the space left by the Agnos-toc
column2: and pushed the other way. So it was two to two
column3: and the key stopped moving again. Then a third tick arrived
column5: and the key started moving away again."|"Demons Don't Dream"|"Piers Anthony"
